Description: On I-95 at mile marker 119.7 in the County of Spotsylvania, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The south right shoulder is closed.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Disabled Vehicle

Description: On I-81 at mile marker 27.3 in the County of Washington, motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle fire. The south right lane and right shoulder are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Vehicle Fire

Description: On VA-288 South in the County of Chesterfield, in the vicinity of the ramp to Ironbridge Road, motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash. Lane closures exist.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Vehicle Crash

Description: On I-395 at mile marker 9 in the County of Arlington, motorists can expect delays due to a tractor trailer crash. The south left shoulder, left lane, left center lane, right center lane, and exit ramp are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Tractor Trailer Crash

Description: On I-95 at mile marker 134.7 in the County of Stafford, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The north right shoulder is closed.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Disabled Vehicle
